arts.ttl: VIDEO: Xabi Alonso’s 3-4-3 At Real Madrid?
arts.sum: In a recently released exclusive Members-only podcast on Patreon, Managing Madrid’s Kiyan Sobhani and Lucas Navarrete discussed possible mid-season coaching changes, summer transfers, hot takes for Real Madrid ’s future, and much more in the weekly mailbag for Members. Listeners and watchers are encouraged to sign up as a Member on Patreon to ensure they don’t miss out on the bonus content that Managing Madrid posts multiple times per week.

arts.ttl: Barcelona fans highlight another officiating inconsistency after Real Madrid 4-1 Las Palmas
arts.sum: Supporters of Barcelona have taken to social media once more on Sunday evening, to make their frustrations with alleged inconsistencies in La Liga’s officiating clear. This comes owing to developments…

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti surpasses Real Madrid milestone with win over Las Palmas
arts.sum: Real Madrid beat Las Palmas 4-1 at the Bernabéu this afternoon with a brace from Kylian Mbappé as well as goals from Brahim Diaz and Rodrygo. Whilst there was plenty…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 4-1 Las Palmas: Player ratings as big win sends champions top of La Liga
arts.sum: Real Madrid hit back in style after conceding early to beat Las Palmas 4-1 in La Liga.

arts.ttl: Mbappé scores twice as Real Madrid beats Las Palmas 4-1
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé continued his scoring streak with a brace as Real Madrid routed 10-man Las Palmas 4-1 to return to the top of the Spanish league on Sunday. Mbappé has struggled at times in his first season with Madrid but now has scored four goals in his last four matches with the Spanish powerhouse.

arts.ttl: Stats: Real Madrid star secures 10/10 match rating for performance in win over Las Palmas
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Kylian Mbappé was responsible for a perfect 10/10 performance in the club’s meeting with Las Palmas. That’s according to statisticians Sofascore, who have provided a breakdown of…

arts.ttl: Mbappe shines as Madrid rally past Las Palmas
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe was in inspired form, scoring twice to guide Real Madrid to a comeback 4-1 win over visitors Las Palmas on Sunday that lifted the champions to the top of the LaLiga standings.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich star spotted in attendance at Real Madrid vs Las Palmas
arts.sum: A leading member of the attacking ranks at Bundesliga heavyweights Bayern Munich was spotted in the crowd at Real Madrid’s meeting with Las Palmas this evening. The player in question?…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 4–1 Las Palmas: Player Ratings As Los Blancos Go Top of La Liga
arts.sum: Real Madrid secured a dominant 4–1 victory over Las Palmas to go top of La Liga.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 4-1 Las Palmas: Highlights, man of the match, stats as excellent Kylian Mbappe puts on a show in the capital
arts.sum: Real Madrid return to the top of the La Liga table in style courtesy of a 4-1 success over 10-man Las Palmas at Bernabeu, with Kylian Mbappe hitting a brace.
